item.title: End ID-81 South at ID-77
item.description: End ID-81 South at ID-77 in Malta. Turn right for ID-77 north. Roadway continues southbound as RRHD (Raft River Highway District) 30S, following the former route of US-30S to the Utah state line.

item.title: End ID-81 South at ID-77
item.description: End ID-81 South at ID-77 in Malta. Use ID-77 north for City of Rocks National Preserve and Castle Rocks State Park.

item.title: ID-81 South at 4th St. N
item.description: ID-81 South at 4th St. N in Malta. Use 4th St. N (via Sublette Road) for I-84 junction.

item.title: ID-81 South - Malta
item.description: Entering Malta on ID-81 south. Speed Limit 45 MPH.

item.title: ID-81 South Approaching Yale Road
item.description: ID-81 South Approaching Yale Road (To I-84 - Exit 228).

item.title: ID-81 South at ID-77
item.description: ID-81 South at ID-77 in Declo. Turn right for ID-77 south to Albion; left for ID-77 north to Rupert and I-84. Continue south on ID-81 for Malta.

item.title: ID-81 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-81 south. Distance to Declo and Malta.

item.title: US-30/BL-84 West at ID-81
item.description: US-30/BL-84 West at ID-81 south to Declo. Continue on US-30/BL-84 for Burley.

item.title: US-30/BL-84 West Approaching ID-81
item.description: US-30/BL-84 West approaching ID-81 south in Burley.

item.title: End ID-81 North at US-30/BL-84
item.description: End ID-81 North at US-30/BL-84 in Burley. Use US-30 East/BL-84 East for Heyburn; US-30 West/BL-84 West for Burley.

item.title: ID-81 North at ID-77
item.description: ID-81 north at ID-71 (To I-84) in Declo. Turn right for ID-77 North/To I-84 to Rupert; turn left for ID-77 south to Albion. Continue north on ID-81 for Burley.

item.title: ID-81 North - Declo
item.description: Entering Declo - Population 343 on ID-81 North. Speed Limit 45 MPH. Milepost 26.

item.title: ID-81 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-81 north. Distance to Declo and Burley.

item.title: End Yale Road at ID-81
item.description: End Yale Road at ID-81. Turn left for ID-81 south to Malta; right for ID-81 north to Declo.

item.title: End Yale Road at ID-81
item.description: End Yale Road at ID-81

item.title: Yale Road West at ID-81
item.description: Yale Road West at ID-81 junction.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 228 Offramp at Yale Road
item.description: I-84 East - Exit 228 offramp at Yale Road. Turn right for Malta and Strevell (and ID-81). Turn left for Yale Road.

item.title: Yale Road West at I-84 East
item.description: Yale Road West at I-84 East (Exit 228) to Ogden (Utah). Continue on Yale Road for ID-81 to Declo and Malta.

item.title: Yale Road West at I-84
item.description: Yale Road West at I-84 (Exit 228). Turn right for I-84 West to Twin Falls. Continue over freeway for I-84 East to Ogden (Utah) and for ID-81 to Malta.

item.title: ID-81 North Approaching BL-84/US-30
item.description: Approaching BL-84/US-30 on ID-81 north in Burley.

item.title: ID-77 North at ID-81
item.description: ID-77 north at ID-81. Use ID-77 north for Rupert and I-84; ID-81 south to Malta; and ID-81 north to Burley.

item.title: ID-77 South at ID-81
item.description: ID-77 south at ID-81 in Declo.

item.title: ID-77 South Approaching ID-81
item.description: ID-77 south approaching ID-81 in Declo.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 228
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 228 - ID-81/Declo/Yale Road.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 228
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 228 - ID-81/Yale Road/Malta.

item.title: Begin ID-81 North Approaching ID-77
item.description: Begin of ID-81 north at ID-77 junction in Malta.

item.title: Begin ID-81 North at ID-77 North
item.description: Beginning of ID-81 north at ID-77 junction in Malta.

item.title: ID-81 North at ID-77
item.description: ID-81 north at ID-71 junction To I-84 in Declo.

item.title: ID-81 North at ID-77
item.description: ID-81 north at ID-71 junction To I-84 in Declo.

item.title: ID-81 North at ID-81 Spur to I-84
item.description: ID-81 north at ID-81 Spur to I-84, Cassia County.
